programme.title: Ringing the Changes
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke muses on George Bush's election and President Putin's visit to New York.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke considers change, the election of George W Bush, the transformation of Rudolph Giuliani after September 11 and Russian President Vladimir Putin's visit to New York.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
